      • expireReservations

        public void expireReservations(ReservationAll rL,
                               java.lang.String todayString,
                               int time_limit)
                        throws java.text.ParseException
        expireReservations method will expire after the time slot
        Parameters:
        rL - the reservation list
        todayString - the date on the day
        time_limit - 30 minute window between reservation and current time
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - for SDF if the format is not parsed correctly
